sect2.title: Games
sect2.para: GNOME helps you achieve your goals, but sometimes your goal is to be distracted. That's when the GNOME games bring the fun.

sect3.title: Same GNOME
sect3.para: The Same GNOME game has a major new version, with better graphics, extra board sizes, and an undo feature in case you change your mind.

sect3.title: Nibbles
sect3.para: Our "Just Works" philosophy is even visible in the Nibbles game. Now you can browse your local network for other people to play against, via the same zero-configuration technique used by GnomeMeeting.
